body:
Git-based conditions database for HEP and other experiments.

Use latest release version and current master to support Linux and macOS. Add core known dependencies and conflicts related to C++17 support. Strictly speaking the conflict on macOS should be "AppleClang less than 11 or OS less than 10.15", but I'm not sure how best to express that yet. 

The `cxxstd` variant is present to help transitive dependencies, and for future support for newer standards in future.
title: New package: gitconddb
